choices: Run away from your table towards the teachers table
1.content:
It was an average day in your typical college. You walked into to the lunch hall and sat down at your table with your friends Marc and Aaron.
"Hey guys, whats goin' on?" You say.
"Nothing much really, the new lunch menu doesn't look that nice to me. It's pretty much all some weird foreign stuff." Aaron replied. Sitting down and looking at the two unfamiliar people sat at our table you whisper to Marc: "Who are those two?" Marc looked at me like i was stupid but said "The taller one is Callum, one of Aarons new mates......... and the other is Jimmy, he's a real badass but a pretty cool guy when you get to know him." You were sat almost in silence round the table picking at the tasteless pasta, but you were hungry so you ate the whole thing anyway. You suddenly felt a sharp stomach pain and gasped for air. It felt as though your body was aflame! Looking around desperately for help you realise that no one has seen you collapsing and are going about their business as normal. You try to scream for help but no sound comes out. Slowly you lose consiousness and fall to the floor.

..........................................

You awaken almost immediately but everything seems different. Everything looks so big.............. Looking around you realise you have shrunk to approximately 1 inch tall!!! Everyone is still at the table so you might have a chance to get someones attention. You hear Aarons voice saying: "Hey where'd Matt go? He was here five minutes ago." and Marc replying with "He's probably gone to the bathroom." You screamed to get their attention to no avail. Looking straight ahead you run beneath the table and decide who to go to. Marc was wearing sports trainers which could be difficult to grip on to. Aaron was wearing old leather school shoes which might be easier. Callum was wearing ratty sneakers which smelt bad from where you were standing let alone getting closer but the material is easy to grip. Jimmy was wearing suede work boots but they were in good condition - you guessed they must be new. The teachers table wasn't far away so that option was always open too........
Who do you choose?
1.title: A strange lunch......

15121.content:
As Hargreaves takes a drag off of the cigarette, his eyes catch you jumping on his belly. He removes the cigarette from his lips, gives a smirk, and slowly blows a huge cloud of smoke down on you. As you begin to cough, he address you.

"Ah, Matt. I assume you will be in class today?"

"Mr. Hargreaves, you have to help me, I've shrunk!"

Hargreaves took another drag off of the cigarette, again coating your tiny body in smoke.

"I can see that, Matt. Why you're barely an inch tall," Hargreaves chuckled.

"You have to get me somewhere, the police, anything! I need help!"

"Tell me Matt, what would the police do for an inch tall man? Or would I even get far enough to get you in the station with such a silly story? Why would they believe that?"

You sat down on the massive belly. You realized that even if Hargreaves tried to tell someone about you, or even tried to show you, no one would probably believe it. Your thoughts were interrupted by more cigarette smoke, and you began coughing. Then curiosity got the best of you.

"Mr. Hargreaves, why weren't you shocked to see me so small?"

"I saw you in the cafeteria running across the floor. I was shocked, but didn't react, I didn't want to call attention to you. As I saw you approach my foot, climb it and hop into my pant cuff, I realized I should probably go somewhere where you wouldn't be noticed. Wouldn't want the wrong people getting their hands on you. I am impressed you climbed my massive girth. I must really look like a giant to you. During the walk I used my phone to send out an email to cancel my classes today."

"So you can help me?" you asked, unsure of where Hargreaves was going.

"I'm not sure Matt. Like I said, no one will believe me. Plus, I'm not going to lie, looking at how tiny you are on my massive belly, I could get used to this."

Hargreaves took a final drag off of the cigarette, smiling before the torrent of smoke rushed out of his mouth, across his beard, and down upon you.

"But for now, we can't stay here. Do you want to go with me, Matt, or would you like me to leave you here?"

info.brief_description: When a weird substance is slipped into your lunch at college, you shrink!
info.description:
At lunch while at collegel you sit down on a table with your friends Aaron and Marc and two people who you have talked to but don't really know them - Callum and Jimmy. But halfway through your pasta you get a terrible stomach ache and begin to feel dizzy. Collapsing on the floor, you begin to pass out.... then you can take it from there :D

A few rules first:
1. Female interaction not allowed - will delete
2. One sentences chapters are fine but don't use them too often.
3. Adding new characters is ok but please keep the main characters in the story.
4. Killing off yourself is ok too but always leave an alternate option before hand.

Heres a brief intro to the main characters..........

You are called Matt. You are 18 and are in college. You are a pretty regular closeted gay kid and like the normal things - sport, video games etc.

Name: Callum
Age: 18
Appearance: Slender overall, slemimuscular, short brown hair, quite tall - 6ft 3, green eyes.
habits: plays a few sports, loves weight training, likes video gaming and watching TV. Quite laid back
shoe size: 14

Name: Aaron
Age: 17
Appearance: A little chubby with slightly muscular arms and thick legs, short blondy brown hair - often gelled, shorter than callum - 5ft 11, has blue eyes
Habits: Quite sporty - star wrestler, a bit lazy when at home, watches TV a lot. Very laid back - loves a joke.
Shoe size: 12

Name: Jimmy
Age: 19
Appearance: fairly muscular but has a bit of a beer belly, short black hair - slightly curly, almost 6ft tall exactly, has brown eyes.
Habits: Smokes and is a bit of a drinker, very lazy - sleeps a lot, plays video games all the time but enjoys boxing. Often agressive - easily angered.
Shoe size: 14

Name: Marc
Age: 18
Appearance: quite slender with slight muscles, medium dark brown hair,quite small at only 5ft 8, has green eyes.
Habits: Plays soccer often, does lots of sport, typical jock - teased for his height though, Picks on others often to vent his own anger
Shoe size: 13

Now its up to you - have fun and get adding!
